name: Find Difference Now - Online
description:
Find Difference Now - Online is a type of puzzle game where the main goal is to find all the differences between the two versions of the same picture which are shown side by side.
It may be that the elements disappear, that the color changes or that there is some object variation. Each time you find a difference, just tap on the screen.
Some differences are very easy to find, but some of them are very mysterious. So get focused and keep your eyes peeled!
Find Difference Now - Online is offering the special power-ups to make your game more fun! Use the hint and radar boosters to find the differences faster than your opponents. If the time is running out use freeze booster to block your opponent.
Find Difference Now is an excellent opportunity to train your brain and enhance your observation skills. Play and enjoy!



Features:

LOTS OF LEVELS
Discover differences in our interesting levels with more added in regular updates.

DAILY BONUSES
Check daily gifts and Magic Wheel to receive boosters and coin rewards that will help you level up!

UNIQUE POWER-UP AND BOOSTERS
The game offers a system of power-ups that will help you find the differences and freeze your opponents.

WEEKLY TOURNAMENTS
Participate in the weekly tournaments and compete with people all over the world for the super prizes!

LIMITED TIME EVENTS
Get to the top of the seasonal events and prove who is the best!

SUITABLE FOR ALL AGES
Our game is suitable for children and adults of all ages!


Our team does not stop to improve Find Difference Now - Online game so your opinions are very important for us! If you have any comments or suggestions about this game, please feel free to contact us.

Email: support@finddifferencenow.com
